Tequila 60 ml.
Cointreau 30 ml.
30 ml lime juice.
Ice.
Salt for the rim of the glass.

20 ml coffee liqueur (Kahlua or Tia Maria for example).
 50ml of vodka.
 30ml cream or milk.

It is a simple cocktail shaker does not require and is presented in short glass. The first is to fill the glass with ice, then pour the coffee liqueur, vodka and finally the cream. If you do not like milk or cream you can try using soy milk or directly go to Black Russian.
